news.markdown:
**4/4 REVIEW** for _May-We-Go-Round?_ in [Fest magazine](https://www.festmag.co.uk/theatre/103215-maywegoround).

**MAY-WE-GO-TO-EDINBURGH?** Many thanks to all who supported our successful Kickstarter campaign! _May-We-Go-Round?_ is at the Edinburgh Fringe. 

**5* REVIEW** for _“It’s okay, I’m dealing with it”_ at [FringeGuru](http://brighton.fringeguru.com/reviews/brighton-2016/its-okay-im-dealing-with-it).
news.html:

events.markdown:
**_May-We-Go-Round?_ at the Edinburgh Fringe 2016**
**9 -- 14 August** --- dancebase --- **[Tickets](http://www.dancebase.co.uk/festival-2016/may-we-go-round-717)**

**_May-We-Go-Round?_ Autumn tour 2016**
**14 October** --- Bath Spa Live, Bath Spa University
**11 November** --- Pegasus Theatre, Oxford --- **[Tickets](http://pegasustheatre.org.uk/?post_type=shows&p=9905)**
**22 November** --- Exeter Playhouse 
**25 November** --- Barbican Theatre, Plymouth --- **[Tickets](https://www.barbicantheatre.co.uk/event-details/?eid=34426)**
**7 December** --- Mumford Theatre, Anglia Ruskin University --- **[Tickets](http://www.anglia.ac.uk/arts-law-and-social-sciences/mumford-theatre/may-we-go-round)**
